about_the_game:
Wow! Behold, the first collection of tracks from "Trombone Champ," one of the "Top 10 Trombone-Based Games of September 2022." These songs are 100% guaranteed to make sounds that you can hear with your ears. If you're a fan of music, you'll definitely notice that this soundtrack contains music.

All tracks are arranged by Holy Wow Studios, with the exception of "Long Tail Limbo," which was written and produced by legendary musician Max Tundra.

All tracks are arranged by Holy Wow Studios, with the exception of "Long Tail Limbo," which was written and produced by legendary musician Max Tundra.
